node.name: Full Bed Foam Mattress MAKE: SLEEPWELL MATERIAL: High Resilience Foam
node.description: High Resilience foam with property like buoyancy to equally dispersed weight of body. Design to suits best for side sleeper customers. Suggested to light weight person of 60 to 70 Kg so that lifespan of high resilience foam can match up to 5 years. (SIZE: 72x48x4 inch / WEIGHT: 7 Kg / WARRANTY: 1 years)
node.content: Sleepwell is the Indian company and before 2019 governed by one of the few Women industrialist / High resilience foam is more responsive than memory foam which means more bounce on the mattress / 48 inch is equivalent to 4 feet which comes in the category of medium size of bed therefore pls check the dimension of bed before purchase / Sleeping on side can offer benefits against recurring pain and sleep apnoea which is breathing problem during sleep but can also cause the stress at shoulder or deltoid muscles / This 4 inch bouncy mattress provides the buoyancy force which equally dispersed at entire side part like shoulder & deltoid / It is advised that if body weight is greater than 75 Kg per person than do select the thickness of 6 inches for the same type of mattress / Lifespan is shorter and below 5 years as compare to other type of durable mattresses.
node.alt: Sleepwell Starlite Discover Firm Foam Mattress 72x48x4

node.name: Full Bed Foam Mattress MAKE: DUROFLEX MATERIAL: Memory Foam
node.description: High density memory foam which is primarily used in space shuttle seating to counter long lasting strain. Design to suits best for stomach sleeper customers. Suggested to medium weight person of 90 Kg so that lifespan of memory foam can match up to 10 years. (SIZE: 72x48x6 inch / WEIGHT: 15 Kg / WARRANTY 10 years)
node.content: Duroflex is leading Indian mattress manufacturer since 1960 with one of the highest export quantity / Sandwich structure with top of 4 inch memory form and remaining 2 inch is made with high density polyurethane foam / 48 inch is equivalent to 4 feet which comes in the category of medium size of bed / As per online survey 7% people sleep on their stomach which causes numbness(loss of sensation or feeling in a part of body), tingling(unusual sensation) and nerve pain, also it is advised that after eating do not sleep on stomach / With 4 inch thick memory form strain on stomach muscles can be countered so that person can sleep without any problem / Medium weight person are best suited for this mattress and it can remain in good shape for maximum weight of 90 Kg per person / Memory form has long lifespan and for this particular design it is 10 years, also warranty is provided for the same.
node.alt: Duroflex Livein  Anti Microbial Fabric 6 Inch Double Size Memory Foam Mattress 72 X 48 X 6

node.name: King Size Bed Foam Mattress MAKE: WAKEFIT MATERIAL: Lux Foam
node.description: Lux foam also known as Evlon foam is very buoyant and provide long-lasting reshape property. Design to suits best for toss & turn sleeper customers. Suggested to overweight person, more than 100 Kg so that lifespan of lux foam can match up to 7 years. (SIZE: 78x72x6 inch / WEIGHT: 12 Kg / WARRANTY: 7 years)
node.content: For king size mattress bed should be at least 1 inch or 2 inch larger from all side / Lux form is made with polyurethane in which density of air pockets is increased layer by layer to provide cushion effect and maybe that’s why it is used for high end furniture’s and at aeroplane seats / Toss & turn sleeping is a problem which encounter with many people who have anxiety disorder or remain stressed, get overstimulated during dreaming / This mattress helps in better sleeping because of extra cosy effect due to its 6 inch thickness / Provide better weight resistance as compare to lifespan which is it can remain in shape for 10 years with maximum weight of 100 Kg per person / In a simple way Mother(100Kg)-Father(100Kg)-Small Boy(15Kg)-Small Girl(12Kg) can sleep comfortably every night.
node.alt: Wakefit Dual Comfort Mattress  Hard & Soft King Bed Size 78x72x6

node.name: Queen Size Bed Foam Mattress MAKE: DUROFLEX MATERIAL: Memory Foam
node.description: High density memory foam which has property to rebound its shape against maximum weight of 120 Kg. Design to suits best for stomach sleeper customers. Suggested to overweight person, more than 100 Kg and lifespan of memory foam can extended to 7 years. (SIZE: 72x60x8 inch / WEIGHT: 28 Kg / WARRANTY: Not Provided)
node.content: Duroflex is leading Indian mattress manufacturer since 1960 with one of the highest export quantity / Sandwich structure with top of 6 inch memory form and remaining 2 inch is made with high density polyurethane foam / 60 inch is equivalent to 5 feet which comes in the category of queen size of bed / Increase in thickness generally helps in relieving the pressure at time of overweight / Three layer of anti-microbial fabric covered the foam and contoured stitching at edges help against wear & tear / Queen size is best for 2 person with maximum weight of 120 Kg per person / Lifespan of 7 year is reviewed through material quality but no warranty is provided on mattress / Best for overweight person with habit of sleeping on stomach.
node.alt: Duroflex LiveIn - Anti Microbial Fabric 8 Inch Queen Size Memory Foam Mattress (72 X 60 X 8)

node.name: Queen Size Bed Foam Mattress MAKE: DUROFLEX MATERIAL: Bonnel Spring + Polyurethane Foam
node.description: Bonnel Spring structure within medium density polyurethane foam that provide curvature according to body height. Design to suits best for back sleeper customers. Suggested to overweight person, more than 100 Kg and lifespan of polyurethane foam can match up to 7 years. (SIZE: 72x60x7 inch / WEIGHT: 22 Kg / WARRANTY: 5 years)
node.content: Under queen size this is durable range of mattress with bonnel spring structure to take load, and medium density polyurethane foam for extra softness / Back side sleeper generally remain straight and with the encountering problem of curvature they hardly get the good sleep / This problem is resolved using specially modified spring that are dug in perfect position so that to parallel the curvature of sleeper / 2 person of weight around 120 Kg is easily manage by the spring distribution and lifespan of spring is not more than 7 years / Purely authentic design which has European standard certification.
node.alt: Duroflex Riseup  Bonnel Spring 7 Inch Queen Size Spring Mattress with Pillow Top 72 X 60 X 6 + 1

node.name: Single Bed Foam Mattress MAKE: WAKEFIT MATERIAL: Memory Foam
node.description: Medium Density Memory foam with air trapped pockets, high-quality conforms to body shape. Design to suits best for stomach sleeper customers. Suggested to light weight person of 60 to 70 Kg so that lifespan of memory foam can match up to 7 years. (SIZE: 72x36x5 inch / WEIGHT: 12 Kg / WARRANTY: 7 years)
node.content: Wakefit is Bangalore based Indian company which import its high durable mattress material from Europe and middle east / Sandwich structure with top of 2 inch memory form and remaining 3 inch is made with high density polyurethane foam / 36 inch width is equivalent to 3 feet that is enough width for single person for sleeping / Stomach sleeping customer generally don't use pillow at head and at this position pressure is at spine / 2 inch memory form provide the ample spine alignment demanded by back / With total thickness of 5 inches it can retain its shape for light weight person of weight between 60 to 70 Kg per person / Lifespan which is measured time after which the material started to lose its property, this mattress have 7 years and for same period warranty is also provided / Breathable cotton with anti-stain nature is used to cover the foam.
node.alt: Wakefit Dual Comfort Mattress  Hard & Soft Single Bed Size 72x36x5

node.name: Single Bed Foam Mattress MAKE: SLEEPX MATERIAL: Latex Rubber Foam
node.description: Latex rubber foam which is non-allergenic and provide long-lasting comfort, envelop in water resistant fabric. Design to suits best for back sleeper customers. Suggested to light weight person of 60 to 70 Kg so that lifespan of latex rubber can match up to 7 years. (SIZE:75x36x5 inch / WEIGHT: 6 Kg / WARRANTY: 3 years)
node.content: Sleepwell subsidiary with in house material inventory regarding latex foam / Latex is a type of rubber which provide a unique feel as a mattress while resisting heat build-up / Non-allergenic, higher comfort level and envelop of water resistance fabric which makes it best for small born babies / Back sleeping customer has many benefits, like their spine are aligned & reduction in tension, also relieve from sinus problem / With back as sleeping position, there is stress on hips & traps muscles, therefore latex foam softness is used to release the tension for healthy sleeping / Total thickness is limited to 5 inches which best for light weight to medium light weight person i.e. maximum weight up to 75 Kg per person / Lifespan is around 7 years and generally after that latex rubber lose the stress-strain curve which means it will shrink down completely with same pounding weight / Soft like a baby skin and may be mostly reviewed users are parents with new born baby.
node.alt: SleepX Brill PU Foam Mattress  Single Bed Size 75x36x5

node.name: King Size Bed Foam Mattress MAKE: WAKEFIT MATERIAL: Memory Foam
node.description: Orthopaedic structuring of air pockets in this memory foam that helps in two people sleeping. Design to suits best for stomach and side sleeper customers. Suggested to medium weight person of 90 Kg so that lifespan of memory foam can match up to 10 years. (SIZE: 78x72x6 inch / WEIGHT: 23 Kg / WARRANTY: 10 years)
node.content: 72 Inches is equivalent 6 feet and this width comes into the category of King Size bed which has enough space for two person and one child / Special type of memory foam is used in this mattress with three layer of structure / Orthopaedic mesh of air pocket is sandwich between two memory form layer and this type of mechanism is very useful for distributing load evenly / Best part of this kind of mattress is if we put the tea filled cup at one side and sit on other side than weight distribution doesn’t spill the tea from cup / Provide effective sleep for two type of sleepers i.e. stomach and side sleeper due to its even weight distribution / Lifespan of 10 years can achieved with the maximum pounding weight of 90 Kg per person / King size mattress is suitable for family up to 4 person, Mother-Father-Small Boy-Small Girl.
node.alt: Wakefit Orthopedic Memory Foam 6inch King Mattress 78x72x6 inches
